a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Weekly number of users contributing to our COVID-19 data repository
Weekly number of users who contributed to Our World in Data's COVID-19 data repository on GitHub, either by

creating or commenting on an issue or
pull request
, shown as a 7-day rolling average.
Data source: Our World in Data (2024)
